file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-12-01-04 - PANEL LIGHTING DIMMER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PANEL LIGHTING DIMMER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the dimmers. B. There are six dimmers which control the lighted pushbuttons, the lighted control panels and the instruments. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-12-01-000-801-A DIMMER - REMOVAL ALL 33-12-01-400-801-A DIMMER - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-12-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-12-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. DIMMER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove one of the six dimmers bellow: • PEDESTAL dimmer • PILOT dimmer • COPILOT dimmer • OVHD dimmer 1 • OVHD dimmer 2 • PUSHBUTTONS dimmer B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113AZ Left forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Left forward electronic compartment EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-12-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the aircraft PRE-MOD S.B.145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) On the aircraft POST-MOD S.B.145-32-0036, install the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Open the circuit breaker of the system from which you will remove the dimmer and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. – OVHD PANEL light (Location tip: DC BUS 1/LIGHTS/OVHD PANEL). – PILOT PANEL light (Location tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/LIGHTS/PILOT PANEL). – PEDESTAL PANEL light (Location tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/LIGHTS/ PEDESTAL PANEL). – PUSHBUTTONS light (Location tip: DC BUS 2/LIGHTS/PUSHBUTTONS). – COPILOT PANEL light (Location tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/LIGHTS/COPILOT PANEL). (4) Remove the access panel 113AZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector (3) from the dimmer. (2) Loosen the two screws (1) and two washer (2) which attach the dimmer (4) to the shelf panel (5). (3) Remove the Dimmer (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-12-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

A 1. SCREW (2) 2. WASHER (2) 4. DIMMER 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 5. SHELF DET. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-12-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. DIMMER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install one of these six dimmer. • PEDESTAL dimmer • PILOT dimmer • COPILOT dimmer • OVHD dimmer 1 • OVHD dimmer 2 • PUSHBUTTONS dimmer B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL INSTRUMENT AND CONTROL PANEL LIGHTS - OP- AMM TASK 33-12-00-700-801-A/500 ERATIONAL TEST S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113AZ Left forward electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Left forward electronic compartment EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-12-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the dimmer (4) in its installation position. (2) Tighten the two screws (1) and two washers (2). (3) Connect the Electrical connector (3) to the dimmer. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the aircraft POST-MOD S.B.145-32-0036, remove the safety pin of the NLG door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (2) Close the related circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (3) Do the applicable system test ( AMM TASK 33-12-00-700-801-A/500). (4) Install the access panel 113AZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-12-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
